src:
Žoc ponovo crveneo, Fener jedva pobedio Afjon (VIDEO)
U matine terminu, gost se držao do poslednjeg minuta

03 Nov 2019

Nikako da proradi ekipa Fenerbahčea ove sezone. Košarkaši ekipe Željka Obradovića sve do jutros bili su u katastrofalnoj seriji od četiri poraza, kojoj su kumovale pre svega katastrofalne igre žuto-plavih, naročito u ofanzivnom delu. Protiv Afjona je taj detalj otklonjen, ali je ponovo bilo dosta muka. Ipak, kada se na kraju podvukla linija, Fener je izašao kao pobednik - 86:80.
Meč se igrao u poprilično zanimljivom terminu za naše prilike, od 11.00 ujutru. Iako su ga znatno bolje otvorili košarkaši iz Istanbula, Afjon je gotovo konstantno bio odmah iza i nije dopuštao žuto-plavima da se odlepe i naprave solidnu razliku. U nekoliko trenutaka tokom druge deonice, gosti su čak bili i u vodstvu, ali je Fener na pauzi imao pola koša prednosti - 36:35.
Pokušavao je Željko Obradović na sve načine da motiviše svoje košarkaše, pozivao ih je kod aut linije, objašnjavao im kako treba da se postave, ali čini se da su košarkaši Afjona bili u potpunosti pripremljeni za ono što ih čeka u najvećem gradu Turske. Dobar deo treće četvrtine proveli su u vodstvu, koje je u par navrata išlo i do pet poena prednosti. Ipak, pred poslednjih deset minuta košarke, gosti su bili u zaostatku od četiri poena.



Činilo se da je meč rešen početkom četvrte četvrtine kada je Fener otišao na plus devet, ali je Afjon još jednom uzvratio. Gosti su se vratili na dva poena zaostatka, ali za nešto više nisu imali snage. Žuto-plavi su ipak bili staloženiji i iskusniji u završnici meča, pa su upisali pobedu.
Samo tri košarkaša su u ekipi Fenerbahčea bila raspoložena na današnjem meču protiv Afjona. Prosto je teško i zamisliti šta bi se desilo da na visini zadatka danas nisu bili Kostas Slukas, Nikola Kalinić i Žofri Lovernj. Ovako, ova trojka je faktički donekle i skinula pritisak sa Željka Obradovića, pošto je Grk postigao 20 poena, srpski košarkaš je završio sa 15, dok je Francuz meč okončao sa dabl-dabl učinkom od 14 poena i 10 uhvaćenih lopti.
Gostima se tako nije isplatila fantastična partija Zane, koji je meč završio sa 24 poena, kao i Oldridža, koji je upisao 17 poena.

TURSKA 1 - 6. KOLO

SubotaBešiktaš - Bujukčekmeče 84:87Pinar Karšijaka - Turk Telekom 85:66Tofaš - Galatasaraj 112:93Orman - Gacijantep 59:83
NedeljaFenerbahče - Afjon Beledije 86:80Anadolu Efes - Sigortam ITU 108:62Darušafaka - Bahčešehir /u toku/18.00: Bandrima - Bursa




Foto: 
Shutterstock
text:
Zoc red again, Fener barely beat Afjon (VIDEO)
In the matinee term, the guest stayed until the last minute

03 Nov 2019

There's no way Fenerbahce will work this season. Until this morning, the basketball team of Željko Obradović was in a catastrophic series of four defeats, to which the catastrophic games of yellow and blue were, first and foremost, especially in the offensive part. Against Afyon, that detail was eliminated, but again there was a lot of anguish. However, when the line was finally drawn, Fener emerged victorious - 86-80.
The match was played at a rather interesting time for our occasion, from 11.00 in the morning. Although it was significantly better opened by the Istanbul basketball players, Afjon was almost constantly right behind and did not allow the yellow-blue to peel off and make a solid difference. At some point during the second leg, the guests were even in the lead, but Fener had a half-point advantage at the break - 36:35.
Zeljko Obradovic was trying in every way to motivate his basketball players, inviting them to the outside line, explaining to them how they should line up, but it seems that Afjon basketball players were fully prepared for what awaited them in Turkey's largest city. They spent much of the third quarter in the lead, which on several occasions went up to five points. Still, before the last ten minutes of basketball, the guests were four points behind.



The match seemed to be settled early in the fourth quarter when Fener went for a plus nine, but Afjon retaliated once more. The visitors came back two points behind, but they had no more power. The Yellow and Blue were more sophisticated and experienced in the final of the match, so they registered the win.
Only three basketball players in the Fenerbahce team were in the mood for today's match against Afyon. It's just hard to imagine what would have happened if Kostas Slukas, Nikola Kalinic and Zofri Lovernj were not at the height of the task today. Thus, the trio actually took some of the pressure off Zeljko Obradovic, as the Greek scored 20 points, the Serbian basketball player finished with 15, while the Frenchman ended the match with a double-double effect of 14 points and 10 balls.
The guests did not pay off for Zane's fantastic game, which ended the match with 24 points, as well as Oldridge, who recorded 17 points.

TURKEY 1 - 6TH ROUND

SaturdayBesiktas - Bujukčekmeče 84: 87Pinar Karsiyaka - Turk Telecom 85: 66Tofash - Galatasaray 112: 93Orman - Gaziantep 59:83
SundayFenerbahçe - Afyon Belediya 86: 80Anadolu Efes - Sigortam ITU 108: 62Daruşafaka - Bahçeşehir / in progress / 18.00: Bandrima - Bursa
